customize_name_description: Choose the username that this app will post as.
customize_icon_description: Choose the icon that is used for messages from this app.
slashcommand_indexers_description: Show all indexers, optionally filter by configured/public
slashcommand_search_description: Search Jackett and returns results (start query with p=?? to paginate, trackers=(??,??) to optionally specify trackers, or filter=(?? ??) to optionally filter the results)
